column8: 7. How did you get to know about mobile banking?

column21: 15. How do you agree with the following statements? [Do you think that you will save time by using a mobile banking application?]
column22: 15. How do you agree with the following statements? [Do you think the mobile banking is secure with compared to the physically going to a bank and doing the operations?]

column38: Regarding the question 15, i may have rated all the things 3,4 hence after using the app for several years I'm used to it now. But in the beginning it was really hard to find features due to the not user friendly UI and the complexity of the terms they have used in the menu items. Therefore even if I can easily perform those day to day things easier, still it's a struggle to find new features.
